methods.inverseTransform:
Transforms a point in Axis space to dataset space.

:param value: (double) - Axis space data point
:return: (double) corresponding value in dataset space
methods.isVisible:
Gets whether a data point is visible in the plot.

:param timeNanos: (double) - data point
:return: (boolean) whether dataValue is visible in the plot
methods.transform:
Transforms a data point to Axis space.

:param timeNanos: (double) - data point
:return: (double) corresponding value in Axis space

text:
AxisTransform into business time. Useful for plotting time series data with large gaps in non-business hours.

 The forward transform takes a data value from standard epoch time and translates it into the cumulative business time
 for the dataset. The inverse transform takes it back to standard epoch time.

 Data values outside of business hours are not visible.
